title: 820-4942  draws 500 mah
message:
I have a 820-4942 pulls 500 mah, no liquid just shut off on customer.
Has 3.3 on all sys power good and cpu getting warm. New to this board what do you guys need to help with this one?

title: 820-4942  draws 500 mah
message:
So board turns on.
Did you check external video and USB activity?

PLT_RESET_L goes high?

title: 820-4942  draws 500 mah
message: I did not, will in the am

title: 820-4942  draws 500 mah
message: Update reassembled and mac now beeps 3 times

title: 820-4942  draws 500 mah
message:
Puff, RAM error; which can also be caused by CPU.
You should reball all RAM chips, are not too many on this board.

title: 820-4942  draws 500 mah
message: I reflowwed them and it booted. So will pull and reball.

title: 820-4942  draws 500 mah
message:
Reball complete. Testing now no beeps and fast..
Is this issue common?

title: 820-4942  draws 500 mah
message: Not so common for this board...
